testers_results.biography: Basic app testing, does app look modern and easy to use and read?

issues.title: Duplicate "Home / Shop / All Items" breadcrumb
issues.description: The breadcrumb "Home / Shop / All Items" is displayed twice.
issues.why_fix: Redundant information creates visual clutter and can be confusing for users.

issues.title: Inconsistent use of capitalization in sidebar menu
issues.description: The sidebar menu items have inconsistent capitalization. 'All Items' is capitalized, while 'Accessories', 'Fashion Type' are capitalized but the child elements are not.
issues.why_fix: Inconsistent capitalization looks unprofessional and can make the site appear less polished.
issues.how_to_fix: Standardize the capitalization of all menu items.

issues.title: Missing label for Sign Up button
issues.description: There is a button with no label in the 'YOUR ACCOUNT' section. Assuming this is a sign up button, it lacks a visible label.
issues.why_fix: Users will not know the function of the unlabeled button, hindering account creation.
issues.how_to_fix: Add a label such as 'Sign Up' to the button.
issues.related_context_if_any: Located in the 'YOUR ACCOUNT' section of the sidebar.

testers_results.biography: Aiden has a keen eye for UI inconsistencies and visual bugs across different devices and screen sizes. Aiden is also a certified scuba diver and enjoys exploring underwater landscapes during his travels.

issues.title: Duplicate 'Home / Shop / All Items' breadcrumb
issues.description: The breadcrumb 'Home / Shop / All Items' is displayed twice in a row.
issues.why_fix: This is redundant and makes the page look unprofessional, slightly impacting user experience.
issues.related_context_if_any: Located above the product title 'DNK Yellow Shoes'.

issues.title: Inconsistent capitalization in sidebar menu
issues.description: The sidebar menu has inconsistent capitalization. 'All Items' is capitalized, while 'Accessories' and 'Fashion Type' are not.
issues.why_fix: Inconsistent capitalization looks unprofessional and can be distracting.
issues.how_to_fix: Standardize the capitalization of all menu items in the sidebar.

issues.title: Missing labels for Sign Up form fields
issues.description: The 'Email Address*' and 'Password*' fields under 'YOUR ACCOUNT' appear to be part of a sign-up form, but are missing proper labels. The text is acting as a placeholder, but this is bad for accessibility.
issues.why_fix: Lack of proper labels reduces accessibility and usability, especially for users with disabilities.
issues.how_to_fix: Implement proper HTML labels for the 'Email Address*' and 'Password*' fields.
issues.related_context_if_any: Located in the sidebar under 'YOUR ACCOUNT'.
